title: Ditch Or Date: Should She Reopen An Old Wound With Her Ex?
description:
You connected with someone, and you two started dating. But they’re starting to show their true colors, and you’re not certain if you should continue dating them or not – and that’s where we come in! Tell us your situation, and we’ll tell you if you should ditch or continue dating the person.
Two years ago, her ex broke up with her to be with another woman. However, six months ago, he reached out apologizing for leaving her. Their conversation went well, and now they're planning on linking up soon to talk. Should she give him a second chance or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
